role: Associate Software Engineer (React Native & React Js Developer)
skills: React Native | React Js | JavaScript | Firebase | Hooks | Redux | Git | Gatsby | Redux-Saga | Recoil | Google Cloud Platform | Push Notifications |
description:
- Responsible for managing and mentoring a team of developers 
- Review the code written by fellow developers maintain the quality of work done
- Create rapid prototypes to vet new design, interaction, and integration concepts
- Help fellow developers to fix technical issues
- Recommend new technologies, design-patterns and user interactions that will help and improve the ongoing and future react-native projects
- Provide detailed estimations to develop react-native projects
- Reviewing react-native architectures build by fellow developers to figure out issues within them and provide options to make them more robust
